title.rendered: Gottwals Books Invites You to Kid’s Corner Tomorrow!

content.rendered: Join us for Kid’s Corner tomorrow, August 28 at 10:00 a.m. at our Warner Robins location. We are excited to welcome Mrs. Debby Walls as our guest reader! There will be book readings, snacks, friends and lots of fun! Check out our events calendar on our Facebook page for more information and details on upcoming events.

excerpt.rendered: Join us for Kid’s Corner tomorrow, August 28 at 10:00 a.m. at our Warner Robins location. We are excited to welcome Mrs. Debby Walls as our guest reader!
